author: Cynthia L
title: Fantastic Location!
text:
My 9 year old daughter and I stayed at the Madison for 6 nights. It was really lovely. The location cannot be beat. Smack in the middle of everything you want to do/see in Paris. Metro station and bus stop across the street - easy to reach everything.
The reception is casual and friendly. The hotel lobby is bright and has great lounge area with wonderful coffee table books. Breakfast area comfortable with firelplace and fun decor.
Our room was a superieur. I had been warned in others' reviews, but was still surprised at how small it was.... it was really small. I was traveling with my 9 year old daughter who doesnt "take up a lot of room" ; ) but it was pretty much the bed and room to maneuver around the bed. There was a small desk, but we would have much preferred a little bureau with drawers for our clothes. There is a closet behind a very large mirror that slides along the wall which had room to hang clothes and store shoes and also shelves and mini fridge (which was well stocked with very nice snack and drink choices). On one side ot the bed there were floor to ceiling built in shelves that could have held clothes, but would not have been attractive or partuicularly useful.
The view from the room was great. We had requested the view of the ancient St. Germain de Pres Church and it was worth the premium room price. Also, in our room # 76, when we opened the window and looked to the left we had a wonderful view of rooftops and the Eiffel Tower - very fun!
The bathroom was divided into two t.i.n.y. rooms.... the shower/tub and sink room and then a separate closet for toilet. Both of these were claustrophobic and not pleasant to use. For a longer stay like ours, I would not choose this size room again.
We had breakfast included and it was really great! wonderful selection of delicious cheeses, pastries, fruit, eggs, smoked salmon, etc. Great coffee. we really enjoyed beginning our mornings there.
Service was very good. We broke a glass in our room and someone came right away to clean it up and vacuum. Maid service was excellent. Sheets were very nice quality.
